name: Ballet
history: Ballet originated during the Italian Renaissance in the 15th century and later developed into a concert dance form in France and Russia. It is known for its grace, precision, and formalized movements.

name: Hip-Hop
history: Hip-hop dance emerged in the 1970s in New York City as a part of the hip-hop culture, which includes rap music, graffiti art, and DJing. It is characterized by its street dance styles and improvisational movements.

name: Salsa
history: Salsa originated in the Caribbean in the early 20th century and combines elements of Afro-Cuban, jazz, and other Latin American musical styles. It is a partner dance known for its lively, rhythmic movements.
